website_summaries.verdict: Nothing can stop you from developing your swing – not rain, snow, cold, or darkness – thanks to this impact bag from golf hall-of-famer Dr. Gary Wiren.
pros: Helps to teach the correct position and feel for the moment of impact in the golf swing
you fill with old towels, linens, clothes or any kind of fabric that will give you the right feel
A great trainer for those who swing from the top
Great for indoor practice when conditions are bad outdoors
cons: Hitting the bag can make a loud, alarming noise
Try to be gentle with the zipper
it may be a weak point on the bag

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart.....very cheap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this expensive ball impact bag and when I hit it the first time the zipper that runs on top and holds the thing together ripped apart. No fixing this junk...tried good ole duck tape etc and now I just keep it in the corner and ask why an impact ball bag cannot stand a slow speed impact with a golf ball. By the way I am 76 years with a swing speed of about 76mph. This item violates every state's Deceptive Trade Practice and False Advertising Act. It most certainly is not as advertised "durable" and Amazon should close down 'Gary Wiren's Golf Training Aid site. Its a fraud.
customer_reviews.author: Ti Ahorangi

customer_reviews.title: Tried a few -liked this one best!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few different types and was most impressed by the higher quality of this bag. Significantly stronger fabric and seams are well stitched. The bag responds with an impressive thump when struck well and I like to use it a few times a week just to remind my sometimes forgetful muscle memory. I have no major objections to the others -just liked this particular one much better.
customer_reviews.author: MKayB

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid smash bag. My suggestion is to watch the many YouTube drill videos out there. You don't hit these bags as hard as possible. The idea is to get feedback as to the correct position at ball impact. The drills videos will help. As for the bag itself, it is made of tough vinyl material. You won't be wasting money on a bag that will fall apart in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Best to fill zip lock bag with sand I used gallon, tape to bottom then stuff with rags old towels etc. will hold in place. It really helped me understand a theory I was having trouble grasping in my lessons.
customer_reviews.author: T. Seldess

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at its duribility. Coupled with a few other traing aids I really think it helps my golf swing. I have a bad habit of swinging at the ball. This aid helps me swing through the ball and lets me know if I hook or slice each swing.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Casting the club? This helps correct that swing fault
customer_reviews.text: The bag appears to be well made. Understand this is not made for full swings, but to drop the club to the contact point and develop a consistent feel for position at impact.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: This is the one to get
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in place of another (cheaper) impact bag that ripped out the bottom after the first 10-15 hits. Hitting this bag puts barley a scuff to the finish. Really solid construction. The bag reeks of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kenmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great training device for those that tend to "swing from ...
customer_reviews.text: Great training device for those that tend to "swing from the top." I suggest using an old graphite shaft while hitting the bag w/ the grip aiming at the bag.
customer_reviews.author: bking

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag!
customer_reviews.text: It works as they advertise. Just be aware, it takes a LOT of towels, rags, etc. to fill the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful practice tool!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. You should know that you have to stuff it yourself, per instructions. We used old towels, rolled up to the favored density. Works well for inside practice if you have enough swing room, you must have some backstop for the bag.
customer_reviews.author: sharon burdeshaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic impact bag for practicing my swing. it is very durable! I filled it up with old clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Stormancast

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in good condition. It appears to be well made and looks to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I make swings against it but the pillows I stuffed it with isn't heavy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Oh

customer_reviews.title: Good Indoor Practice Tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my step-son. He said it’s the best indoor practice tool he’s ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Met all of my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent training aid and I have seen the improvement after only a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Luis E Ordonez

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he likes it. The golf team he is with recommended it and it is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid, provides immediate feedback.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome learning tool, really takes a beating. Great quality, stuffed an old, thick king size comforter in it and it's perfect. I use this to focus on keeping my hands ahead through impact and it works wonders as it provides immediate feedback. It would be great if it came with exercises to support improvement according to user focus, but you can find lots of information like that on YouTube. I use this a lot in my basement for half swing exercises; just place it against something heavy and immobile and swing away. Can also use for full swings/strength training outside.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, strong fabric and works well in my golf practice.
customer_reviews.author: College Football Fan

customer_reviews.title: Get it.  No buyers remorse...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s been around for a long time and now I see why. Really let’s you get a feel for the swing.
customer_reviews.author: Indijoe

customer_reviews.title: Moves a little when hit
customer_reviews.text: Works well just a little difficult to keep in one place when hitting
customer_reviews.author: rich618

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase So far
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and it was as described. Satisfied with my purchase So far.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The zipper busts open if you hit the bag with any significant force.. then your laundry starts popping out.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke

customer_reviews.title: wonderful Golf swing training bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit for indoor training of golf swing. I am satisfied with this training bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sangmin Goag

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Best training aid out there.Able to find solid and consistent contact while working with this.It really does educate your hands.
customer_reviews.author: William f. Golden

customer_reviews.title: The moment of Truth!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for instant feedback hip rotation and lag. Say goodbye to over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The zipper broke after 5 minutes of use and I made sure that I had not overstuffed the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Eltiste

customer_reviews.title: # 1 training aid besides professional lessons
customer_reviews.text: Great training aid for anyone regardless their current handicap. Instant feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Harriman

customer_reviews.title: Received it promptly. Exactly what I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and I am sure it will help my game
customer_reviews.author: Dean Jelden

customer_reviews.title: Great Impact Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great training tool for squaring up the club at impact. Easy to use and instant feedback. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Playgolfnj

customer_reviews.title: excellent bag -- used it doing the winter and it ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent bag -- used it doing the winter and it never tore open.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. I have used it for two weeks (so far) to work on improving the lag in my golf swing. The product is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Norman

customer_reviews.title: better contact and more consistent after using the training aid
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working, better contact and more consistent after using the training aid
customer_reviews.author: DSR

customer_reviews.title: Best impact bag!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried multiple brands, but Dr. Gary Wiren Impact bag is by far, the best. It is durable, and will last you a long time.
customer_reviews.author: shpvail

customer_reviews.title: great help from the Doctor Gary Wiren impact bag
customer_reviews.text: this impact bag is the best thing that I have come across to assist me in getting the face of the club at thcorrect position for impact.the impact bag has also been a great help to my wifesister hitting power it was less than desired, she is now hitting the ball straighter and at greater distances.we should have purchase this impact bag sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training aid.
customer_reviews.text: If you have difficulty coming down on the ball this bag is for you.
customer_reviews.author: robert g.davis

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my dad to work ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad to work in his swing. He says he loves it and works with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This really helps develop increased club head speed and that pull with your leading arm. If you have trouble w/turning your shoulders first before you pull the club through this helps with that a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Trueblood MD

customer_reviews.title: The zipper was flawed. Would not close the impact ...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper was flawed. Would not close the impact bag. I never used and returned. Maybe just a fluke- I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip at the bottom seam
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for almost one month now. It is a very study bag and can be a great learning tool. However, along the bottom seam, I do have a rip and it is getting bigger. As a result, I'm contemplating returning this bag for another one. If not for this rip, I'd have nothing to complain.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Do

product_meta.title: Impact Bag Golf Swing Trainer - Dr. Gary Wiren’s Golf Training Aid and Practice Tool - Waterproof and Durable
product_meta.description: Impact Bag immediately gives you the feedback as to the clubface position at the critical moment of impact. Impact Bag will cushion the blow of your shot thus producing the correct feel of a square clubface position at impact.
feature_bullets: POINT OF IMPACT: Perfect the most important part of any golf swing, the point of impact.
LOWER SCORES: As you become more familiar with a square club face and solid contact, your score will naturally start to drop.
PROFESSIONAL GOLF: Used by professional golf teachers around the world and designed by World Golf Teachers Hall of Famer, Dr. Gary Wiren.
REPETITION: Repeatedly strike the Impact Bag to improve muscle memory and perfect your swing.
LONG LASTING: The Impact Bag is both durable and waterproof.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
